title: Besu loses sync on Goerli, `Critical Exception Processing Transaction`
body:
### Description

Besu loses sync. It's an alpha version, this bug may already have been fixed.

teku/v22.10.2/linux-x86_64/-eclipseadoptium-openjdk64bitservervm-java-17

besu/v22.10.1-alpha/linux-x86_64/openjdk-java-17

### Logs


It recovered from this with a restart on 22.10.0. No debug logs alas. This is server hardware w/ ECC RAM, I am assuming a software issue.
Hey @yorickdowne - was this behavior with `--Xbonsai-use-snapshots=true` on 22.10.2?
@non-fungible-nelson I want to say yes. I've removed that parameter by now.

Ok - thanks for the report. We are updating our messaging about this experimental flag to be only used in an attempt to recover a node in a bad state and not for normal operation until we can iron out the behavior. on 22.10.2 we are slowly porting over the parts from snapshots to our default behavior and with this flag it can conflict. Closing for now, as we are tracking this issue here - #4785
